title: Pickup my child
subtitle: I would like to pick up my child
message: A message has been sent to the security and the student.
Please show your Emirates ID for verifications and approval.
Please have a seat the student will come within a few minutes

title: Technical issues
subtitle: I am facing technical issues
message: A message has been sent to the technical support team.
Please describe the issue in detail when they arrive to assist you."
Please have a seat on the waiting area

title: Meet consular
subtitle: I have meeting with a consular
message: A message has been sent to the consular.
Please wait in the designated meeting area.
You will be notified when the consular is available.

title: Correction Details
subtitle: My child's details isn't completed
message: A message has been sent to the administration office
Please proceed to the administration desk for assistance in completing your childâ€™s details.
Please show your Emirates ID for verifications and approval.

title: Meet teacher
subtitle: I have meeting with a teacher
message: A message has been sent to the teacher.
Please wait in the visitors area. The teacher will meet you shortly.

title: Complaint
subtitle: I have a complaint
message: A message has been sent to the relevant department
Please proceed to the reception desk, where you can share the details of your complaint.

title: Transportation
subtitle: I have transportation related question
message: A message has been sent to the transportation coordinator.
Please wait for further instructions or proceed to the transportation desk.

title: Other...
subtitle: I have other type of query
message: Please specify your request at the reception desk. Our team will assist you shortly.
